features.name: Twitter service health check
features.description: GET /health returns 200 with status=ok for Twitter service

features.name: Twitter response time < 2s
features.description: Health endpoint responds within 2000ms

features.name: Twitter CORS headers present
features.description: Response includes Access-Control-Allow-Origin header

features.name: Twitter service version returned
features.description: Health response includes service version string

features.name: Twitter uptime reported
features.description: Health response includes uptime or started_at field

features.name: Twitter valid auth token accepted
features.description: Request with valid Bearer token returns 200, not 401

features.name: Twitter missing auth returns 401
features.description: Request without Authorization header returns 401

features.name: Twitter invalid token returns 401
features.description: Request with 'Bearer invalid' returns 401

features.name: Twitter malformed Bearer returns 400 or 401
features.description: Request with 'Bearer ' (empty) returns 4xx

features.name: Twitter token in query param rejected
features.description: Token passed as ?token= without Bearer header is rejected

features.name: Twitter auth error body has message field
features.description: 401 response body includes message or error field

features.name: Twitter OPTIONS preflight passes without auth
features.description: OPTIONS request returns 200 without auth header

features.name: Twitter auth bypass attempt blocked
features.description: Request with X-Forwarded-For spoofing returns same 401

features.name: Send Twitter DM
features.description: POST /api/twitter/dm/send with username+message returns success=true

features.name: Send DM to protected account
features.description: POST /api/twitter/dm/send to protected account returns success=false with clear reason

features.name: Get DM conversation list
features.description: GET /api/twitter/dm/conversations returns conversation array

features.name: Get messages in Twitter DM
features.description: GET /api/twitter/dm/messages/:id returns message array

features.name: Post reply to tweet
features.description: POST /api/twitter/comments/post with postUrl+text returns success=true

features.name: Reply with AI-generated content
features.description: POST /api/twitter/comments/post with useAI=true returns ai_generated=true in response

features.name: Get Twitter rate limit status
features.description: GET /api/twitter/dm/rate-limits returns rate limit state

features.name: Post exceeds 280 chars is rejected
features.description: Tweet text > 280 chars returns validation error

features.name: DM with media attachment
features.description: POST /api/twitter/dm/send with media_url succeeds or returns clear error

features.name: Navigate to Twitter profile
features.description: POST /api/twitter/navigate with handle opens correct profile

features.name: Get comment thread
features.description: GET /api/twitter/comments/:tweetId returns reply thread

features.name: Search tweets by keyword
features.description: POST /api/twitter/search with keyword returns post array

features.name: Get tweet engagement stats
features.description: GET /api/twitter/posts/:tweetId returns likes, retweets, replies counts

features.name: Queue tweet for scheduled send
features.description: POST /api/twitter/schedule with future timestamp queues tweet

features.name: Cancel scheduled tweet
features.description: DELETE /api/twitter/schedule/:id cancels queued tweet

features.name: Send DM with bookmark link
features.description: DM with URL in message succeeds and link is preserved

features.name: Get trending topics
features.description: GET /api/twitter/trending returns topics array

features.name: Like a tweet
features.description: POST /api/twitter/like/:tweetId returns success=true

features.name: Retweet a post
features.description: POST /api/twitter/retweet/:tweetId returns success=true

features.name: Get own Twitter profile metrics
features.description: GET /api/twitter/profile returns follower_count, following_count, tweet_count

features.name: Twitter missing required body field returns 400
features.description: POST without required field returns 400 with field name in error

features.name: Twitter empty string body returns 400
features.description: POST with empty string for required text field returns 400

features.name: Twitter null value in required field returns 400
features.description: POST with null for required field returns 400 with message

features.name: Twitter wrong content-type returns 415 or 400
features.description: POST with text/plain instead of application/json returns 4xx

features.name: Twitter extremely long string (>10000 chars) handled
features.description: POST with 10001 char string returns 400 or truncates gracefully

features.name: Twitter SQL injection attempt in text field rejected
features.description: Text containing SQL keywords is sanitized, not executed

features.name: Twitter XSS payload in text field is escaped
features.description: Text with <script> tags is returned safely escaped

features.name: Twitter service down → 503 or circuit open
features.description: When downstream unavailable, returns 503 with retry-after header

features.name: Twitter timeout returns 504 with message
features.description: Request that takes >30s returns 504 gateway timeout

features.name: Twitter duplicate action returns idempotent result
features.description: Sending same DM twice returns success without duplicate

features.name: Twitter invalid enum value in body returns 400
features.description: POST with platform='invalid' returns 400 listing valid values

features.name: Twitter error response always JSON
features.description: All 4xx/5xx responses have Content-Type: application/json

features.name: Twitter stack trace not exposed in production
features.description: 500 error response does NOT include stack trace

features.name: Twitter connection refused returns retryable error
features.description: When port not available, error includes retryable=true flag

features.name: Twitter method not allowed returns 405
features.description: GET on POST-only endpoint returns 405 with Allow header

features.name: Twitter unicode emoji in payload works
features.description: Unicode emoji 😀🔥 in text field is preserved

features.name: Twitter RTL text (Arabic/Hebrew) handled
features.description: Arabic text in body is returned correctly

features.name: Twitter newline chars in text preserved
features.description: Text with \n is stored and returned with newlines intact

features.name: Twitter zero-width space character handled
features.description: Text with zero-width space doesn't crash processing

features.name: Twitter URL with query params in text preserved
features.description: URL with ? and & in text is not altered

features.name: Twitter very short text (1 char) works
features.description: Single character text in body accepted

features.name: Twitter duplicate consecutive spaces normalized
features.description: Multiple spaces in text handled without error

features.name: Twitter numeric username as string works
features.description: Username '123456' as string is accepted

features.name: Twitter pagination limit=0 returns empty or default
features.description: limit=0 returns empty array or default page

features.name: Twitter pagination page=9999 returns empty array
features.description: Out-of-range page returns empty array, not 404

features.name: Twitter rate limit headers present on responses
features.description: Response includes X-RateLimit-Limit and X-RateLimit-Remaining

features.name: Twitter 429 returned when limit exceeded
features.description: Exceeding configured rate limit returns 429 with Retry-After

features.name: Twitter Retry-After header is integer seconds
features.description: Retry-After value is parseable integer > 0

features.name: Twitter rate limit resets after window
features.description: After wait period, subsequent requests succeed again

features.name: Twitter concurrent requests handled safely
features.description: 5 simultaneous requests don't cause 500 errors

features.name: Twitter daily cap tracked per account
features.description: GET /rate-limits returns per-account daily_used field

features.name: Twitter force=true bypasses active-hours guard
features.description: POST with force=true during inactive hours still processes

features.name: Twitter DM/action stored in Supabase
features.description: After successful action, row appears in relevant Supabase table

features.name: Twitter no duplicate rows on retry
features.description: Retrying same action doesn't create duplicate DB row

features.name: Twitter timestamps are ISO 8601
features.description: created_at column in stored rows is valid ISO 8601 string

features.name: Twitter platform field set correctly
features.description: Stored row has platform field set to correct platform name

features.name: Twitter contact upserted in crm_contacts
features.description: New user interaction upserts record in crm_contacts table

features.name: Twitter conversation synced to crm_conversations
features.description: Conversation appears in crm_conversations after DM sync

features.name: Twitter message synced to crm_messages
features.description: Individual messages appear in crm_messages after sync

features.name: Twitter RLS policy allows service reads
features.description: Supabase SELECT with service role key succeeds

features.name: Twitter SELECT returns rows with all required columns
features.description: Query result includes id, created_at, platform, content

features.name: Twitter failed action NOT stored
features.description: When action fails (success=false), no row is inserted

features.name: Twitter AI message generation returns string
features.description: POST /ai-message or /suggest-reply returns non-empty string

features.name: Twitter AI output respects platform char limit
features.description: AI-generated text for this platform fits platform char limit

features.name: Twitter AI model field returned in response
features.description: AI response includes model_used field

features.name: Twitter AI error falls back gracefully
features.description: When Claude API fails, returns fallback text or 503

features.name: Twitter AI output is on-topic for niche
features.description: Generated message for solopreneur niche mentions relevant terms

features.name: Twitter AI scoring returns 0-100 integer
features.description: Prospect/content score is integer in [0, 100] range

features.name: Twitter AI reasoning field non-empty
features.description: Score response includes non-empty reasoning or signals array

features.name: Twitter AI structured output is valid JSON
features.description: When model returns structured JSON, it parses without error

features.name: Twitter MCP initialize handshake completes
features.description: Send initialize → receive result with protocolVersion

features.name: Twitter tools/list returns valid schema array
features.description: Each tool has name, description, inputSchema fields

features.name: Twitter tool call returns result content array
features.description: Valid tool call returns result.content[] with type field

features.name: Twitter tool error returns structured error
features.description: Invalid tool params returns isError=true with message

features.name: Twitter MCP over stdio doesn't crash on empty line
features.description: Empty newline in stdio stream doesn't crash server

features.name: Twitter tool result is serializable JSON
features.description: Tool result can be JSON.stringify'd without circular refs

features.name: Twitter sequential tool calls maintain session
features.description: Call tool A then tool B in same session — both succeed

features.name: Twitter unknown tool returns method-not-found
features.description: Call with unknown toolName returns -32601 or error

features.name: Twitter tool timeout returns error gracefully
features.description: Tool that takes >30s returns timeout error, not hang

features.name: Twitter MCP server restarts cleanly after crash
features.description: After killing and restarting, first tool call succeeds

features.name: Twitter session created with unique ID
features.description: Create session returns unique sessionId string

features.name: Twitter session persists between requests
features.description: Two requests with same sessionId share browser state

features.name: Twitter expired session returns 404
features.description: Request with old/expired sessionId returns 404 or error

features.name: Twitter close session frees resources
features.description: Close session endpoint confirms session removed

features.name: Twitter list sessions returns active sessions
features.description: List sessions returns currently active session IDs

features.name: Twitter p95 response time < 5s for core ops
features.description: 95th percentile of 20 sequential calls is under 5000ms

features.name: Twitter 10 concurrent requests all succeed
features.description: 10 simultaneous requests return 200 with no 500 errors

features.name: Twitter large payload (50 items) handled
features.description: Response with 50+ items in array is returned correctly

features.name: Twitter streaming response works if supported
features.description: If SSE/streaming supported, first chunk received within 2s

features.name: Twitter cold start after idle < 10s
features.description: First request after 5min idle returns within 10s
